{{CustomTabs|tab1=Overview|tab2=Reaction|tab3=Enemy|tab4=Weapon|tab5=Character|tab6=Talents}}
For [[enemies]], their HP, ATK and DEF are determined by '''base values''', '''level multipliers''' and '''special multipliers'''.

For [[wildlife]], most of them have 0 Base DEF and 0 Base Resistance. Their level HP multipliers are 1 for all levels. Their level ATK multipliers are the same as the multipliers of enemies.

==Base Value==
===Base HP===
<math>\text{Max HP} = \text{Base HP} \times \text{Level Multiplier}</math>

Level Multipliers for each level will be listed in the '''HP Level Scaling''' section.

Note: Due to all enemy Base HPs being proportional to the Hilichurl's, it can be used as a baseline for comparison. The Base HP Ratios to Hilichurl provided are for ease of comparison only and are not used in the calculation process.

====Example====
For example, to calculate a [[Specter]]'s Max HP at Level 85:

<math>\begin{align} \text{Max HP} & = 21.7344 \times 2223.0679 \\ & = 48317.0469658\end{align}</math>

Where:
* '''21.7344''' is the Base HP
* '''2223.0679''' is the Type 2 HP Level Multiplier at Level 85

===Base ATK===
<math>\text{ATK} = \text{Base ATK} \times \text{Level Multiplier}</math>

Level Multipliers for each level will be listed in the '''ATK Level Scaling''' section.

Note: Due to all enemy Base ATKs being proportional to the Forest Boar's, it can be used as a baseline for comparison. The Base ATK Ratios to Forest Boar provided are for ease of comparison only and are not used in the calculation process.

====Example====
For example, to calculate a [[Specter]]'s ATK at Level 70:

<math>\begin{align} \text{Max HP} & = 17.584 \times 118.01392 \\ & = 2075.15676928\end{align}</math>

Where:
* '''17.584''' is the Base ATK
* '''118.01392''' is the Type 2 ATK Level Multiplier at Level 70

===DEF Level Scaling===
For enemies, the function for level scaling is linear.

For calculation,

'''Level DEF Multiplier = 1 + 0.01 * Level'''

==Special Multiplier==
{{See also|Co-Op Mode}}

===Special HP Multiplier===
For types of special HP multipliers, there are Quests, Domains, Spiral Abyss and Co-Op Mode.

Special HP multipliers of different types stack multiplicatively.
